basic_data.cell_line_alt_name: CANVAS1-2 Het GC; C1-2 Het GC

publications.title: Generation and heterozygous repair of human iPSC lines from three individuals with cerebellar ataxia, neuropathy and vestibular areflexia syndrome (CANVAS) carrying biallelic AAGGG expansions in RFC1

donor.disease_description: Patient with biallelic AAGGG repeat expansion in intron 2 of RFC1
donor.disease_name: Cerebellar ataxia, neuropathy, and vestibular areflexia syndrome (CANVAS)

genomic_modifications.description: Heterozygous gene correction of the pathogenic AAGGG repeat expansion in RFC1 intron 2 using dual gRNAs; deletion of the expanded repeat and flanking sequence confirmed by Sanger and RP-PCR.

genomic_characterisation.summary: Illumina GSA v2.0 SNP array (0.5 Mb resolution) detected no aneuploidies; SNPduo confirmed >99.9% identity to parental fibroblast.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: pEP4 E02S ET2K; pEP4 E02S EN2L; pEP4 E02S EM2K

ethics.institutional_HREC: Human Research Ethics Committee of the Royal Children's Hospital
